Reviews.Title: “Such an amazing place. Such a great location!”
Reviews.Author: thursowick
Reviews.Content: wow loved five minute walk main train station santa lucia tiny little alley picturesque venetian staff couldnt communicate somehow figure helpful owner spoke english nice clean lovely recommend hotel plus windows look picturesque alleyway lovely wooden shutters stone walkways etc

Reviews.Title: “Nice and cozy.”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: family owned hotel cozy staff extremely friendly allowed luggage checking borrow umbrella surprising rain morning walls extremely thin

Reviews.Title: “Acceptable but little more”
Reviews.Author: bishclone
Reviews.Content: stayed venice september unseasonably hot weather hotel fine clean service basic husband caught nights mosquitos feast wifi available lobby disappointing information werent told breakfast check assumed wouldnt breakfast fine service prompt lacked warmth real plus hotel location close train bus station short walk modern bridge bus station preferable trying luggage vaporetto path hotel visited choice smells emanating beneath ply board covering

Reviews.Title: “Great location, lovely staff, super clean.”
Reviews.Author: TurnLeftandKeepGoing
Reviews.Content: definitely recommend hotel stayed 3 nights march double third floor clean tastefully decorated modern chintzy warm light location perfect 10 min walk bus station 4 min walk main water taxi station owners lovely people obviously pride running hotel loved definitely stay stay lovely restaurants rio della including excellent paradiso la cantina strada nova worth visit

Reviews.Title: “A pleasure to stay at this intimate family hotel”
Reviews.Author: mrstraveller2011
Reviews.Content: fantastic service staff times spacious spotless beds modern lovely fresh sheets daily breakfast modest coffee juice cake rolls cheese ceral etc served pleasant reception location 5 min walk car park entrance venice helpful luggage centre town save stiff ferry tickets happy service price fair stay

Reviews.Title: “relatively budget in the venice Lagoon and friendly location”

Reviews.Content: cheapest options available net booking expensive city venice lagoon islands cheap options multinational brands except hilton mainland mestre treviso airport charm venice location reasonable choice walking distance train station bus station piazzale roma walk canals despite location lagoon central hotel tiny sidestreet look hard alley left station lista di spagna close jewish ghetto actually charming stroll close vaporetti water buses stops cheapest souvenir shops venice including paintings tapestries hoever friendly staff dingy appearance despite dodgy windows locks safe locality internet free sparse adequate european style cold breakfast help maps etc additional plus beautiful city nicer stay canal view die save budgeting rest world

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful, well-located small hotel run by excellent hoteliers, the Bico family.”
Reviews.Author: sodalime
Reviews.Content: delightful quiet hotel located close train station top floor spotless wellappointed bathroom wifi breakfast family accommodating stuck venice iceland volcanic cloud recommended excellent travel agency close ghetto magic touch travel service igor excellent suggestions easy walk highly recommended reasonable rate venice
